name: Zonic
description:
This is a game based on reaction,good movment in space and fast control of a block to pass by some walls,in addition to that you can change your block color to 2 other colors this helps you go through walls that have the same color that you have so you better have fast reactions. Now we work at making your own level and making a comunnity pool of levels. The game begins to be very hard form level 3.

Thanks for playing our game and we will like some feedback.
